paper_abstract: A simple dynamic biasing scheme to extend the input/output range of cascode amplifiers is introduced. It requires minimum extra hardware and no additional power consumption. A dynamic biased telescopic op-amp is discussed as an application example. Experimental results of a fabricated test chip in 0.5 mu m CMOS technology are presented that verify the proposed technique. paper_title: A power efficient and simple scheme for dynamically biasing cascode amplifiers and telescopic op-amps
